entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:15 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 9:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
